## Ringkasan

- [ ] Tujuan perubahan
- [ ] Dampak modul (Routes, Policies, Filament Resource, Migration)

## Checklist

- [ ] Lulus `vendor/bin/pint --test`, `vendor/bin/phpstan analyse`, dan `php artisan test`
- [ ] Menambah/ubah policy bila perlu
- [ ] Menghindari query N+1 dengan eager loading
- [ ] Dokumentasi terkait diperbarui (mis. `docs/ARCHITECTURE.md`, `docs/DEVELOPER_WORKFLOW.md`, `docs/SECURITY_COMPLIANCE_GUIDE.md`)
